sentence: The White House requested for Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition on Wednesday, or else face termination, according to CNN.
author: Alex Nitzberg
title: White House ousts Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker from President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition

sentence: President Joe Biden has axed Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz from advisory roles with the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition due to their current candidacies for the U.S. Senate.
author: Charles Passy
title: Why President Biden fired Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz from a federal fitness council

sentence: A White House official told CNN Wednesday that Oz, along with fellow council member and Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, were in violation of the Biden administration's policy of federal candidates serving on presidential boards.
author: Heather Hamilton
title: WATCH: Dr. Oz responds to Bidens request that he resign from fitness council

sentence: Oz, best known as the host of The Dr. Oz Show, and Herschel Walker were both sent letters on Wednesday asking them to resign by the end of the day or they would be terminated, a White House official told NBC News.
author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Dr. Oz Calls Biden 'Petty' After Being Asked to Quit President's Council

sentence: Just as President Joe Biden has reportedly asked GOP Senate candidates Herschel Walker and Mehmet Oz to resign their posts on the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition, Biden has announced his intent to appoint their replacements.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: Biden moves to oust GOP Senate candidates Herschel Walker, Dr. Oz for Jos Andrs, Elena Delle Donne

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker were both appointed to the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition by twice-popular-voter-loser former President Donald Trump.
title: Biden requests resignations of Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker by end of day

sentence: But Mehmet Oz, MD, still brought up Fauci in response to the Biden Administration asking both him and Herschel Walker to resign from the Council.
author: Bruce Y. Lee
title: Dr. Mehmet Oz Asked To Resign From Presidents Council, Brings Up Dr. Fauci Again

sentence: Theres no upside to debate, said Jason Shepherd, the chair of the Republican Party in Cobb County, Ga., if youre someone like Herschel Walker who is already the frontrunner and has no experience debating.
title: Debate-dodging takes off in midterm campaigns
